original_title: Story of Dinda: Second Chance of Happiness
overview: Dinda just wants to be happy, but often reality does not match expectations. But now he meets someone who makes him realize: good love is not always full of wounds. A sense of calm that is not restrained, maturity that is not excessive and still gives freedom to every childish nature.
tagline: Is there a chance for a second happiness?
title: Story of Dinda: Second Chance of Happiness
